short_summary: Doing maintenance, repair and retraining of work machinery...
description: The Department of National Defence has came in need for a number of products. Deliveries amounts to the DND shops in two deliverr locations...
full_summary:
======================
**Shop Equipment and Utility Tender Notice**
==============================================

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   101 Colonel By Drive
    *   Ottawa, Ontario
    *   K1A 0K2 Canada
*   **Procurement Notice Reference:** W8486-249546
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-23T14:00:00
*   **Acquisition Type:** Competitive - Open Bidding (CAC 007)
*   **Products/Services:** The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the delivery of industrial machinery components and accessories, specifically for shop equipment and utility supplies.
*   **Quantity:** 10 units for each Part No.: S49352
*   **Location:** 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E., Montreal, QC H1N 1V9, and 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 4J5
*   **Delivery Terms:** Buyer will deliver to the specified location.
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Components Included in the Purchase:**

*   Shipping and Storage Container, Miscellaneous Equipment (Part No.: AR24201202)
*   Smoke Test Kit (Part No.: 21-7006)
*   Gas Analyzer (Part No.: 400563.3305)
*   Multimeter (Part No.: 179)
*   Indicator Tube, Gas (Part No.: IG1LK)

**Tender Number:** W8486-249546
**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Notice Status:** Expiration

**Contact Information:**

*   Deborah Moldowan, Contracting Authority
*   Phone: (819) 939-0832
*   Email: Deborah.Moldowan@forces.gc.ca

**Language of Tender:** English and/or French (documents may be submitted in either language)
**Tender Documents:** Please contact the contracting authority for access to tender documents.

This tender is currently expired. However, if you wish to propose equivalent or substitute products, kindly indicate the brand name and model, or the part number and NCAGE. 

**Notice of Expiration**
This tender has expired. The department reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers for this procurement
